channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘He has become hostile’: My mom is in her 80s and has dementia. My brother is blocking access.
item.description: “Can someone who has not been found legally incompetent, but who has a history of delusions, make decisions regarding property?”

item.title: Warren Buffett gifts us 5 secrets for investing success as he hands off Berkshire Hathaway’s reins
item.description: Three paragraphs in a 1994 letter to Berkshire Hathaway shareholders reveal the top reason for Buffett’s phenomenal winning record.

item.title: ‘We never want to think our children would strip us of all our money’: Is it safe to give my kids my Social Security number?
item.description: “Regrettably, I have a good friend whose brother robbed their mother of a significant amount of money before her death.”

item.title: ‘I’m on a fixed budget’: Silver and gold are now too expensive for me. What else can I gift my infant grandchildren?
item.description: “I’ve already listed them as beneficiaries on my 401(k).”

item.title: ‘I’m fed up’: My selfish mother-in-law has controlled me for 30 years. How can I regain my power?
item.description: “I’m almost 50 years old. Enough is enough. I am exhausted by it.”

item.title: Bernie Sanders and Ron DeSantis speak out against data center boom. It's a bad sign for AI industry
item.description: Sen. Bernie Sanders has called for a data center moratoriu, while Gov. Ron DeSantis has pushed back on the AI industry in Florida.

item.title: End of an era: Warren Buffett serves last day as Berkshire Hathaway's CEO
item.description: While change for the company Buffett bought six decades ago is likely to be gradual, it is also inevitable.

item.title: Retail investors close out one of their best years ever. How they beat Wall Street at its own game
item.description: Mom-and-pop investors bought the dip at key points, giving them outsized benefits from the market's run this year.

item.title: 2026 will bring more GLP-1 weight loss pills — and new habits. These stocks are poised to benefit
item.description: Novo Nordisk and Eli Lilly are expected to bring GLP-1 pills to market in the new year, which is expected to boost the number being treated.

item.title: Investors are betting these stocks will reap considerable returns in 2026
item.description: Investors shared some of their 2026 stock picks, including Adobe, Citigroup and TSMC, with CNBC's "Halftime Report" on Wednesday.

item.title: Holy Ship! HII Stock Jumps on Trump Navy Ship Plans
item.description: HII stock rises on Trump's Golden Fleet plans for new powerful warships. Explore how navy announcements impact markets, with balanced views on potenti...

item.title: Intuitive Machines Stock Rockets on Analyst Upgrade
item.description: Meta description: Intuitive Machines (LUNR) stock rockets 37% on KeyBanc overweight rating and $20 target amid lunar contract potential. Discover risk...

item.title: Sable Offshore Stock Surges on Trump Admin Pipeline Boost
item.description: Whoa, folks, have you seen what’s happening with Sable Offshore today? This energy player, ticker SOC, is lighting up the charts with one of the bigge...

item.title: DBVT Stock Rockets on Positive Peanut Allergy Patch Trial
item.description: DBVT stock surges as much as 46% on positive Phase 3 results for Viaskin Peanut patch, a potential breakthrough treatment for peanut allergies in youn...

item.title: Trump’s Weed Pivot Ignites CGC Stock Surge
item.description: Canopy Growth (CGC) surges 50%+ as Trump eyes marijuana reclassification. Explore the buzz, risks, and trading lessons in this volatile sector.
